Text: Semi-OK quality - 128 kbps, tags for artist and album ARE ALL IN CAPITAL LETTERS WHICH ARE ANNOYING, plus one song with lowercase letters.

@ThreeDee

Just get MP3 tag Studio - It's free:
http://www.magnusbrading.com/mp3ts/

Most albums / compilations on here have crappy filenames and/or tags. This fixes them easily.
i nearly dont keep up with the downloading and arrange on my libary..keep it comming...
on higher quality stereo installations this suffers from static and crisps (especially high tones)  . better u spend some time in finding some real quality.
